text: Unn logon ki misal jo apna maal Allah Taalaa ki raza mandi ki talab mein dil ki khushi aur yaqeen kay sath kharach kertay hain uss baagh jaisi hai jo oonchi zamin per ho aur zor daar barish uss per barsay aur woh apna phal dugna laway aur agar uss per barish na bhi barsay o phuwar hi kafi hai aur Allah tumharay kaam dekh raha hai
